title: Products
noPrices: No prices yet for this product
beFirstToAdd: Be the first to add a price
productNotFoundDesc: The product you are looking for does not exist.

pending.title: Product Pending Admin Approval
pending.description: This product is waiting for admin review. You can still add prices and view it, but it won't be visible to other users until it's approved. You earned +5 trust points for adding this product!

messages.priceVerified: Price verified! You earned +2 trust points.
messages.needsApproval: Your price submission requires admin approval
messages.priceOutlier: Your price seems unusually high or low compared to other submissions. It will be reviewed by our team before being displayed.
messages.enterStoreName: Please enter store name, address, and city
messages.failedLoadStores: Failed to load stores. Please try again.

priceDetails.voteAccurate: Vote that this price is accurate
priceDetails.voteNotAccurate: Vote that this price is not accurate

addToListModal.title: Add to Shopping List
addToListModal.noListsDesc: Create your first shopping list to get started

addPriceModal.title: Add New Price
addPriceModal.storePlaceholder: Select or search for a store...

priceHistoryChart.title: Price History
priceHistoryChart.noPriceHistory: No price history available for this period

addProduct.title: Add New Product
addProduct.subtitle: Product not found? Add it to our database!
addProduct.reviewDescription: New products are reviewed by our team before going live. This helps maintain database quality. You'll be able to add prices once the product is approved.
addProduct.successAlert:
Product added successfully! (+5 points earned)

Your product is pending admin approval, but you can start adding prices to it right away. It will be visible to everyone once approved.

productList.title: My Products
productList.subtitle: Products you've submitted to PriceMon
productList.searchPlaceholder: Search products by name, brand, or barcode...
productList.noProducts: You haven't added any products yet
productList.noProductsDesc: Start contributing by adding your first product!
productList.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters

barcodeSearch.title: Scan Barcode
barcodeSearch.subtitle: Enter a product barcode to search or add a new product
barcodeSearch.barcodeHelper: Typical barcodes are 8, 12, or 13 digits long
barcodeSearch.pending: This product is pending approval. Please wait for admin review.
barcodeSearch.rejected: This product was rejected. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
barcodeSearch.howItWorks1: If the product exists, you'll see its details and can add a price
barcodeSearch.howItWorks2: If not found, you'll be able to add it to the database
barcodeSearch.howItWorks3: All new products are reviewed before going live
barcodeSearch.httpsWarningDesc: For security reasons, camera access requires a secure connection (HTTPS). If the camera doesn't work, please use Manual Entry instead.
